thread.title: Josh M
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Josh M

author: Josh M
title: Josh M
text: I dealt a lot with Elizabeth. She was the only person I spoke to from all of the companies I called who actually took the time and cared about me and my vacation. She was such a huge help and I cannot wait to be in my cabin for a week!! The extra perks from Colonial make it that much better! Thank you all!!
